abstract: Recent federal rulings should and will motivate responsible sovereign debtors and private creditors to resolve their differences at the negotiating table, and not in the courtroom, the author contends.
snippet: Recent federal rulings should and will motivate responsible sovereign debtors and private creditors to resolve their differences at the negotiating table, and not in the courtroom, the author contends.
lead_paragraph: Harry Tether is a retired managing director at JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Courts Are Right to Hold Argentina to Equal Debt Treatment

abstract: Days after posting a jump in profit, Goldman Sachs said the bank’s chief executive and chairman had been granted restricted stock valued at $13.3 million for 2012, which is expected to bring his total compensation to $21 million.
snippet: Days after posting a jump in profit, Goldman Sachs said the bank’s chief executive and chairman had been granted restricted stock valued at $13.3 million for 2012, which is expected to bring his total compensation to $21 million.
lead_paragraph: Lloyd C. Blankfein is getting a raise.

headline.main: Goldman Awards Blankfein $13.3 Million in Stock
headline.print_headline: Blankfein Is Awarded $13.3 Million In Stock
